Magnum muttered, then turned to Razorwing.

Magnum: Good riddance, but you =
should have slaughtered him anyways.

Razorwing: Perhaps, but he's got some=
 truth there. For instance, how
would you deal with the Minions?

Magnum: S=
imple! With all the Predacons and their ilks between me and
them! At the be=
st, less work for me, at the worst, more fun for me!

Deadfur, though, was =
indecisive. He was a Watcher, not a Maximal, not
a Predacon. And he wondere=
d if Megatron was not right...

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Robert Riley=
 <chiyohakuryuu@...> wrote:
>

> 
> "I've told you what you ne=
ed to know.  But I see you are just as
petty and SMALL as the rest of this =
pathetic lot.  Fine then, stay
here and rust," megatron said, his thrusters=
 igniting and lifting into
the air.
> 
> "Farewell cowards!" he called down=
 to them and laughed as he
transformed to fly off for the Black FOrtress.
